entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 48 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
